title: The Masterpiece
description: “My senior photo, 1989. I remember the photographer and his helper had to move their set up back in order to capture my whole head. Side note: this picture got me voted Greatest 80s Hair by National Geographic TV’s contest!.” (submitted by IG @markymonts) The post The Masterpiece appeared first on AwkwardFamilyPhotos.com.
author: Team Awkward
excerpt: "My senior photo, 1989. I remember the photographer and his helper had to move their set up back in order to capture my whole head. Side note: this
text: “My senior photo, 1989. I remember the photographer and his helper had to move their set up back in order to capture my whole head. Side note: this picture got me voted Greatest 80s Hair by National Geographic TV’s contest!.” (submitted by IG @markymonts)
html:
“My senior photo, 1989. I remember the photographer and his helper had to move their set up back in order to capture my whole head. Side note: this picture got me voted Greatest 80s Hair by National Geographic TV’s contest!.”

(submitted by IG @markymonts)
